name: distinctiveness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being easy to recognise because of being different from other things: The retailer lacks the distinctivenss to thrive in the current market. We are proud of our distinctiveness as Canadians. See
distinctive
More examplesFewer examplesAnything in your application that allows a college to see your distinctiveness can make a difference.As a company, emphasize your distinctiveness and don't cut prices, our experts advise. She praised Vasquez, both for his warm personality and the distinctiveness of his work.
